nodes.text: The Mark of Altruism was a sculpture. It was awarded to a spacer in 1.5 ABY after they completed a task in an effort to become a hero, which displayed their altruism and selflessness. When combined with the other "Mark" sculptures, it formed a spherical shape.

A spacer, under the task of a strange Rodian hermit, gained this sculpture after displaying true altruism by assisting a poor moisture farmer in rescuing his wife and child from a vicious criminal gang known as the Sennex on Tatooine.
